cause.description:
“Krista", a six-week-old kitten doused with gasoline, set ablaze, and thrown from a moving car in Richmond Hill, Ontario where she was left for dead.
Criminals who deliberately abuse animals like "Krista" are seldom charged,or get away with a maximum fine of $2000. The maximum penalty is 6 months jail time. They can’t even be banned from owning animals for more than 2 years! It’s time our laws were changed.
1. Stop Animal Cruelty in Canada: Support Anti-Cruelty Laws
